title: UK : length of wait for security screening in Luton Airport 2018
summary: This statistic shows a distribution of UK , length wait for times in the United Kingdom in 2018 .
According to Thinkbox and Ipsos , 48 % of respondents reported typically waking for at approximately 6 - 7am .
gold: The greatest share of passengers at Luton Airport waited between one to five minutes to be security screened.
Only 25 percent stated that they had queued for longer than six minutes , although none of the respondents waited for longer than 30 minutes.
85 percent of passengers at Luton airport were satisfied with their security screening experience .
